summary: Client requested that helloworld be changed to say 'back up and running'. The developer executed change request req_1760279811026 and updated helloworld.py; PM, Architect, and QA provided no comments.

decisions.title: Change request executed
decisions.details: Developer executed change request req_1760279811026 to update helloworld.py so it displays 'back up and running'.

sign_offs.what: Executed and confirmed update to helloworld.py per request req_1760279811026

actions.task: Update helloworld.py to display 'back up and running' (req_1760279811026)

backlog_deltas.title: Update helloworld.py to display 'back up and running'

risks.risk: Change was deployed without QA comments or explicit QA sign-off, risking undetected issues.
risks.mitigation: Run QA regression tests, obtain QA sign-off, and monitor logs/behavior post-deployment.
